page.title: 11Food in Highworth.
page.content: The ten main foods people of Highworth buy in 1985 are bread, milk, vegtables, cereal, cheese, eggs, fruit, butter, margarine,meat.Most people like to buy fresh not frozen vegtables and about 2lb_8lb of fruit a week.They buy mostly apples and bananas and sometimes oranges. Not many people buy health foods and if they do they are mostly young people.People spend about Â£40.00 on food a week.People like to shop in small local shops.Everybody shops nearly everyday for little things and has a big shop once a week. Most people like salads.Here are the prices of the main foods:Bread 29p, Milk 20p,Potatoes 15p per lb,Cereal 55p, Cheese 95p per lb, Eggs 38p for 6, Fruit 45p per lb,Butter 45p.
